thread.title: Mary Holliday
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Mary Holliday

author: Mary Holliday
title: Mary Holliday
text: Found a chaise lounger in your weekly ad and called to make sure it was in stock. Salesperson was very helpful and checked inventory. Went to store next morning and made purchase. Was happily surprised that it could be delivered same day. Delivery personnel were very careful and made sure I was happy with product.
